name: header
description: Generates custom HTTP response headers to return to the client.

params.name: value
params.description: A value for the HTTP header. This attribute is used in conjunction with the name attribute.

params.name: statuscode
params.description: A number that sets the HTTP status code.

params.name: charset
params.description:
The character encoding in which to encode the header value.

For more information on character encodings, see: <https://www.w3.org/International/questions/qa-html-encoding-declarations>.

params.name: statustext
params.description:
Text that explains the status code. This attribute is used in conjunction with the
	statusCode attribute.
